title: Shadows 9/??
body:
(Reality Bites excerpt):

…Recalling Jon’s excitement (after all seeing him curse at the screen, bite his nails, groan in misery, or hug and smother her with kisses of joy when his team scored, was not something one could forget easily), she wondered if he had tickets to see the game live or if he’d watch it at home. It would suck if he had to work on that day, but with how passionate he was about the sport, she was sure he would have asked for the day off.

So, why don’t I just ask him myself? she thought with her heart now pounding just a little harder. Plucking the phone from the bedside table, she cradled it in her trembling hands for some time before taking a deep breath and pulling up his name.

If anyone had told her that simply typing out the words ‘Hello. How are you?’ would be the most difficult thing in the world, she would have probably laughed in their faces. Yet she was, five tedious minutes later, typing and backspacing and calling herself every name in the book for being so indecisive. With a final muttered curse, she reached into the bedside table’s drawer to withdraw a journal where Jon’s note was tucked neatly between its pages. She hesitated to call them ‘diaries’, as it sounded so childish a term. For instead of daily scribbles about her life, these were words she jotted down whenever her mind went into its frenzy of thoughts she was unable to articulate – not even with sign language. It was a suggestion made by her therapist in Braavos, and Dany found it quite beneficial especially on days the frustration would reach a fever pitch and her head felt like exploding.

She smoothed out Jon’s note, knowing she had already memorized its contents and it was quite fruitless having it out again, but somehow seeing the paper, his handwriting, and actually touching it between her fingers made it all seem more tangible. It was a reminder that he was real and not simply a figment of an imagination or a conjured fantasy for a weekend simply to be forgotten.

Continue on AO3

Thanks to the lovely @annagreengrass for the moodboard!

body:
Brienne deserves better than Jaime?

People believe it’s a controversial argument that Brienne of Tarth deserves better than Jaime Lannister. I’m a hardcore Braime shipper, in my opinion the statement is true. Nobody can deny it. After everything Brienne has been through, knowing her childhood and history it feels like Jaime Lannister is too complicated and problematic and certainly not good enough for such pure angel like Brienne. But! There’s always a but! The reason I don’t wholeheartedly believe the statement NEEDS to happen, aka “Brienne shouldn’t end up with Jaime” is because of Brienne’s history again. After her childhood trauma and Renly, Jaime played a vital role in her story. Brienne has been through a lot, but she has been through a lot with Jaime by her side too. What we need to understand is, no matter all the flaws and how problematic and emotionally unstable Jaime is, Brienne has developed a strong feeling for Jaime. It wasn’t love at first sight or Jaime’s charm like Renly which made her fall for him. It happened unconsciously but it did over time! To even think that the only man Brienne thinks about is Jaime, the only person she wants to be with is Jaime proves that she wasn’t deceived by his good sides only. Brienne has seen all sides of Jaime in all stages, she knows his deepest secret, she knows him for who he is and she knowingly fell for him. Brienne is in love with Jaime Lannister. So at this point, it’s not the question how compatible they would be as a couple or why they shouldn’t be together for such problems. Everyone deserves to be with someone they love, so does Brienne. The only person Brienne Of Tarth deserves to be with is the person she loves, Jaime Lannister.

summary: Game of Thrones: Season 7 - A Review
title: Game of Thrones: Season 7 - A Review
body:
While waiting for season 8…

Hey Guys!
As all Game of Thrones fans out there know, we’ll have to wait another year before we finally get to see season 8. So in the meantime I decided to re-watch the other 7 seasons and do my long overdue review on the last one!

The Plot:
Winter is coming and it’s getting closer. Daenerys finally made it to Westeros, so we get…

summary: „Game of Thrones“-Traumhochzeit: Jon Snow hat geheiratet
title: „Game of Thrones“-Traumhochzeit: Jon Snow hat geheiratet
body:
Sie lernten sich am Set der HBO-Serie „Game of Thrones“ kennen. In ihren Rollen als Jon Snow und Ygritte verliebten sie sich. Nun haben die beiden Darsteller Kit Harington und Rose Leslie im echten Leben geheiratet.

Happy End auf Westeros! Sechs Jahre, nachdem sie sich bei Dreharbeiten der Fantasy-Saga auf Island kennenlernten, haben sich Kit Harington und Rose Leslie in einem 900 Jahre alten schottischen Schloss das Ja-Wort gegeben.

Bei der Trauung in dem kleinen Ort Kirkton of Rayne waren 200 Gäste eingeladen, darunter auch einige Prominente aus dem „Game of Thrones“-Serienuniversum. Neben Emilia Clarke wohnten auch Maisie Williams, Sophie Turner und Peter Dinklage der Zeremonie bei.

Im Anschluss an die kirchliche Trauung ging es für das frisch verheiratete Paar in das Familienschloss von Rose Leslie in Aberdeenshire. Auf dem Weg und vor dem Schloss hatten sich Fans postiert, um einen Blick auf ihre Lieblinge werfen zu können.

Erstmals haben Harrington und Leslie ihre Liebe im April 2016 öffentlich gemacht – und zwar bei einem gemeinsamen Auftritt auf einem Roten Teppich. Im September 2017 haben sich die beiden schließlich verlobt, was sie der Welt über eine Anzeige in der „Times of London“ mitteilten.

Sebastian Leslie, der Vater der Braut, soll laut dem US-Sender CBS „außer sich vor Freude“ über die Hochzeit seiner Tochter sein. „Es ist ein wunderschöner Tag für uns alle“, sagte er.


Alle Bilder: AP Photos, Getty Images

tags: how could you not love her
summary: I think you are obsessed with Gwendoline...
question: I think you are obsessed with Gwendoline...
answer:
I’m ABSOLUTELY obsessed with her. Have you seen her???? She’s amazing!
She’s so cute she makes my heart race, I just love her so much. She’s a passionate and dedicated actor and her modelling is unreal, I can’t wait to see more in the future.

I couldn’t think of anyone better to be obsessed with to be honest 💖
